servinfo.title: DTC P1777: TCM Lost Communication with ECM (Reception Error)

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC P1774: CAN Communication Bus Off .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: Reception error of communication data for ECM is detected for longer than specified time continuously.

s1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch turned OFF.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC by using scan tool.
Start engine and run it for 1 min. or more.

attention3.ptxt: Upon completion of inspection and repair work, perform DTC Confirmation Procedure and confirm that the trouble has been corrected.

test1.ptxt: Check connection of connectors of all control modules communicating by means of CAN.
Recheck DTC in TCM referring to DTC Check .

action.ptxt: Intermittent trouble. Check for intermittent referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

testgroup.title: DTC check in ABS/ESP® control module

test1.ptxt: Check DTC in ABS/ESP® control module.

testgroup.question: Is there DTC U1100?

test1.ptxt: Check DTC in ECM referring to DTC Check .

action.ptxt: Go to DTC P1674: CAN Communication (Bus Off Error) .
Check ECM power and ground circuit. If circuit is OK, CAN communication circuit between ECM and ABS/ESP® control module is open circuit.

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Disconnect connectors of all control modules communicating by means of CAN.
Check CAN communication circuit between control modules for open, short and high resistance.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

action.ptxt: Check TCM power and ground circuit. If circuit is OK, substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.
